C

cache() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Directory which can use used to store runtime/cache data: Win: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Local; Unix: $XDG_CACHE_HOME (default: $HOME/.cache). Usually you'd like to invoke resolve("<appname>") on return value to create subdirectory.
config() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Directory which can use used to store configuration data: Win: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Local; Unix: $XDG_CONFIG_HOME (default: $HOME/.config). Usually you'd like to invoke resolve("<appname>") on return value to create subdirectory.

D

data() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Directory which can use used to store data: Win: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Roaming; Unix: $HOME/.local/share. Note that Windows will sync changes with domain server.
dataLocal() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Directory which can use used to store data: Win: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Local; Unix: $HOME/.local/share. Usually you'd like to invoke resolve("<appname>") on return value to create subdirectory.
desktop() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Desktop directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Desktop; Unix: ~/Desktop.
documents() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Documents directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Documents; Unix: ~/Documents.
downloads() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Downloads directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Downloads; Unix: ~/Downloads.

H

home() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Current user Home directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%; Unix: ~.

I

io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths - package io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths
Standard Paths library.

M

music() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Music directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Music; Unix: ~/Music.

N

NoSuchPathException - Exception in io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths
Indicates that underlying OS system is either damaged or in malformed state.
NoSuchPathException(String) - Constructor for exception io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.NoSuchPathException
Constructs a new exception with the specified detail message.

P

pictures() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Pictures directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Pictures; Unix: ~/Pictures.

S

StandardPaths - Class in io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths
Collection of methods, which return paths to the most common system locations.

T

temp() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Temp files directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Local/Temp; Unix: /tmp.

V

videos() - Static method in class io.github.sanyarnd.standardpaths.StandardPaths
Videos directory: Win: %USERPROFILE%/Videos; Unix: ~/Videos.
